Name: Desire
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: An elderflower influenced cognac sour sweetened with agave nectar and served on-the-rocks.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Traverso Alessandro at Mistral lounge bar in Recco, Genova, Italy.
Nutrition: One serving of Desire contains 193 calories
